name: GoPro HERO6
description: With 4k60 and 1080p240 video, HERO6 delivers 2x the performance compared to HERO5 with an all new GP1 chip optimized for GoPro capture, HERO6 delivers vastly improved image quality.

name: GoPro Camera Fusion - 360
description: Spherical video + photos capture incredible 5.2K videos and 18MP photos  by shooting in every direction at once.Turn 5.2K spherical videos into traditional 1080P videos from any angle right on your phone.

name: Canon IXUS 185 red
description: Zoom to 16x with great quality,720p HD movies. Aspect Ratio 4:3,Canon IXUS 185 Camera Red 20MP 8x Zoom HD,exceptional quality results with 20.0 Megapixels.

name: DBPOWER D5 Native 4K EIS Action Camera
description: Native 4K EIS Action Camera 2 inch LCD Touchscreen 14MP WiFi Waterproof Sports Camera with 4K 30fps Video and 170Â° Wide-Angle Lens 2.4GHz Remote Control Rechargeable Batteries

name: Nikon COOLPIX S3700
description: Nikon COOLPIX S3700 Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom and Built-In Wi-Fi (Pink),8x optical zoom; 16x dynamic fine zoom, an enhanced zoom function that effectively doubles your reach

name: Polaroid iE X29
description: The red Polaroid iE X29 Digital Camera features an 18MP image sensor to produce high-resolution stills along with HD 720p video. The sensor also affords a sensitivity range of ISO 100-400 .

name: Polaroid PIC-300 Instant Film Camera
description: The Polaroid 300 Instant Film Camera is a compact, stylish camera that you'll want to take everywhere. This is a point-and-click camera great for parties, art projects, and instant photos.

name: Polaroid SNAP Camera-Black
description: The black Snap Instant Digital Camera produces physical print thanks to ZINK Zero Ink Technology. The 10MP 1/3.2 inch CMOS sensor pairs nicely with a 3.4mm f/2.8 lens, equivalent to 25.8mm in 35mm terms.

name: Polaroid Socialmatic Instant Digital Camera
description: Polaroid Socialmatic 14MP Wi-Fi Digital Instant Print & Share Camera -  Black & White,4.5-Inch Full Color LCD Touchscreen; 4GB Memory, Expandable to 32GB,Full-Fledged Android OS

name: Underwater Camera Sealife Micro 2.0 64GB WiFi
description: SeaLife Micro 2.0 Pro 2500 Set, Includes 64GB Underwater Wi-Fi Camera, Sea Dragon 2500 Lumen Light, Flex Arm, Sea Dragon Case and more, sharp full HD videos with 1080p HD @ 60 frames per second.

name: Sony 20.1MP Digital camera
description: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver),20.1 Megapixel(effective) Plus 8x Zoom and number of pixels (Gross)is approx. 20.4 megapixels,Optical Steady Shot image Stabilization with 2-way Active Mode.

name: Ricoh 3842 WG-6 GPS Waterproof Digital Camera
description: Its waterproof , shockproof ,freezeproof, crushproof, dustproof, and resistant to chemical disinfection.The WG-6 features a 20MP BSI CMOS sensor, a sensitivity range from ISO 125-6400, and UHD 4K30 video recording.

name: David Woods
description: If you want to take up photography as a hobby, or aspire to be a photojournalist or wedding pro, you'll want to get a camera that gives you room to grow and learn the craft.

name: Sofia Rocks
description: If you want to take up photography as a hobby, or aspire to be a photojournalist or wedding pro, you'll want to get a camera that gives you room to grow and learn the craft.
